Package ix.iview.domain

Objects that mirror those of the domain (in ix.icore.domain package) for UI purposes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
UIEditableObject An interface for objects to be edited, especially via IForm editors
UIObject A construct that mirrors a domain object and adds UI things.
 

Class Summary
UIDomain Mirrors the Domain for safe editing and adds UI things and change management.
UIGrammar A class that holds grammar information - dummy for now.
UINodeSpec  
UIObjectClass A class that helps to edit type specifications for activity relatable objects.
UIRefinement Mirrors the domain's Refinement and adds UI, Graph, and TreeNode things
UISpec A class to distinguish different types of specifications that can come back from a SpecEditor.
 

Exception Summary
DomainReferenceException  
 

Package ix.iview.domain Description

Objects that mirror those of the domain (in ix.icore.domain package) for UI purposes.
